entries.title: Pope Francis to Preside Over Predecessor's Funeral, in a Vatican First
entries.description: Plans for the service mean a historically unique situation—that of two popes residing practically side by side in the Vatican—will come to a similarly unusual close.

entries.title: Brazil's Lula Makes Remarkable Return to Power After 12 Years
entries.description: The 77-year-old icon of the Latin American left faces some of his toughest challenges yet, from uniting a divided nation to protecting the Amazon and boosting the incomes of the poor.

entries.title: Chinese Factories, Restaurants Adjust to Life Without Zero-Covid
entries.description: Businesses in China have to get their supply chains in order after a topsy-turvy time capped by an abrupt Covid-policy reversal—and withstand a wave cases sweeping through employee ranks.

entries.title: Ukraine Begins 2023 Under Attack From Russian Drone Swarm
entries.description: Air-raid sirens sounded in Kyiv less than one hour after Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky delivered a New Year address just before midnight.

entries.title: Australia Joins Countries Requiring Covid Tests From China Travelers
entries.description: Australia joined in implementing Covid-19 testing for travelers from China, citing a lack of information from China following its relaxation of Covid containment measures.

entries.title: North Korea's Kim Vows to Increase Nuclear Arsenal
entries.description: The North Korean leader ordered the development of a new intercontinental ballistic missile system capable of carrying out a quick nuclear counterstrike.

entries.title: Ukraine Rings In New Year With Hope of Russia Defeat
entries.description: Optimism is tempered by worsening economic pain as President Volodymyr Zelensky pays tribute to the sacrifices made.
